Home Addition Services

Expand your living space with seamless additions that enhance your home and lifestyle

Licensed & Insured
(732) 984-1043
Serving All Monmouth County

Create the Space Your Family Needs

When your family outgrows your home, you have two choices: move or improve. At Custom Kitchens & Baths by Lopez, we help Monmouth County families choose improvement by creating beautiful, functional additions that feel like they've always been part of your home.

Whether you need an extra bedroom for a growing family, a home office for remote work, or an in-law suite for aging parents, our expert team designs and builds additions that perfectly match your home's architecture while meeting your specific needs.

With 20 years of experience building additions throughout Monmouth County, we understand local building codes, architectural styles, and the unique challenges of expanding homes in our area.

Why Choose an Addition?

Increased Home Value

Well-designed additions typically return 60-80% of investment at resale.

Avoid Moving Costs

Expand your current home instead of the expense and hassle of relocating.

Custom Design

Create exactly the space you need, tailored to your family's lifestyle.

Stay in Your Neighborhood

Keep your community connections, schools, and familiar surroundings.

Start Planning Your Addition

Types of Home Additions We Build

From simple room extensions to complete second stories, we have the expertise to handle any addition project. Each type offers unique benefits and possibilities.

Room Additions

Add a new bedroom, home office, or family room to expand your living space.

Features & Benefits:

  • Single or multi-room expansions
  • Seamless integration with existing home
  • Complete electrical and HVAC
  • Matching exterior finishes
Typical Size:

200-500 sq ft

Timeline:

3-6 months

Second Story Additions

Double your living space by adding a complete second floor to your home.

Features & Benefits:

  • Master suite additions
  • Multiple bedrooms and baths
  • Structural engineering included
  • Staircase design and installation
Typical Size:

800-2000 sq ft

Timeline:

4-8 months

Sunrooms & Four Seasons Rooms

Enjoy natural light year-round with a beautiful sunroom addition.

Features & Benefits:

  • Climate-controlled comfort
  • Energy-efficient windows
  • Seamless home integration
  • Custom lighting options
Typical Size:

150-400 sq ft

Timeline:

6-12 weeks

In-Law Suites & ADUs

Create independent living space for family members or rental income.

Features & Benefits:

  • Private entrance options
  • Full kitchen and bath
  • Separate utilities possible
  • Aging-in-place features
Typical Size:

600-1200 sq ft

Timeline:

3-6 months

Garage Conversions

Transform unused garage space into functional living areas.

Features & Benefits:

  • Insulation and climate control
  • New flooring and finishes
  • Window and door additions
  • Maintains home aesthetics
Typical Size:

400-800 sq ft

Timeline:

6-10 weeks

Our Proven Addition Process

Building an addition is a major project. Our systematic approach ensures everything runs smoothly from concept to completion.

1

Initial Consultation

Discuss your needs, vision, and budget. We evaluate your property and existing structure.

2

Design & Planning

Create detailed architectural plans that maximize space and complement your home's style.

3

Permits & Approvals

We handle all necessary permits, HOA approvals, and township requirements.

4

Foundation & Framing

Build a solid foundation and frame your addition to exact specifications.

5

Systems Integration

Seamlessly connect electrical, plumbing, and HVAC to your existing systems.

6

Finishing Touches

Complete interior and exterior finishes to match your existing home perfectly.

What Sets Our Process Apart

Fast Track Permits

Our relationships with local building departments expedite approvals

3D Visualization

See your addition before construction begins with realistic renderings

Fixed Pricing

Detailed contracts with no hidden costs or surprise charges

Why Monmouth County Homeowners Trust Us

Local Building Expertise

We know Monmouth County's building codes, permit requirements, and architectural styles inside and out. From historic districts to shore communities, we build additions that comply with local regulations and complement neighborhood aesthetics.

Structural Integrity

Every addition starts with proper engineering. We work with licensed structural engineers to ensure your addition is built to last, properly supported, and seamlessly integrated with your existing home's structure.

Quality Craftsmanship

Our skilled craftsmen take pride in their work. From foundation to finishes, every aspect of your addition is built with attention to detail and quality materials that stand the test of time.

Project Management

A dedicated project manager oversees your entire addition, coordinating subcontractors, managing timelines, and keeping you informed every step of the way. One point of contact for peace of mind.

Home Addition FAQs

How much does a home addition cost in Monmouth County?

Home addition costs vary widely based on size and complexity. Basic room additions start around $15,000-25,000, while second-story additions can range from $100,000-300,000. We provide detailed quotes after evaluating your specific project needs.

Do I need permits for a home addition?

Yes, all home additions in Monmouth County require permits. We handle the entire permit process, including architectural drawings, permit applications, and coordinating inspections throughout the project.

How long does it take to build an addition?

Timeline depends on the project scope. Simple room additions take 2-3 months, while second-story additions may take 4-8 months. Weather, permits, and material availability can affect timelines. We provide realistic schedules upfront.

Can I live in my home during construction?

Most clients continue living at home during additions. We minimize disruption by sealing off construction areas, maintaining clean job sites, and scheduling noisy work considerately. For major additions, temporary relocation might be more comfortable.

Will my addition match my existing home?

Absolutely. We carefully match rooflines, siding, windows, and architectural details to ensure your addition looks original to the home. Our goal is seamless integration that enhances your home's appearance and value.

Have specific questions about your addition project?

Get Expert Answers
